thread.title: Maybe USC’s next fire should be Pat Haden
thread.title_full: Maybe USC’s next fire should be Pat Haden - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ann Killion
title: Maybe USC’s next fire should be Pat Haden
text: Steve Sarkisian didn’t quite get the Lane Kiffin treatment. Kiffin was fired by athletic director Pat Haden on the airport tarmac after arriving home from an embarrassing loss at Arizona State.
